content.content: Hello. ENS team is currently planning to organise one day ENS workshop, similar to the one we organised last year, followed by a 2 day weekend hackathon in London at the beginning of August. Please see the following blog post for more detail.    Medium – 7 Jun 18    Call for partnership at the ENS Workshop & Hackathon 2018 We are currently planning to organise a one day ENS workshop, similar to the one we organised last year, followed by a 2 day weekend… Reading time: 2 min read       Thanks. Makoto
